attributes.additional_details:
-Many British people favour a second referendum 
-many of the leave voters were older people, while many younger people didn’t vote 
-many leave voters changed their mind 
-there were lots of Russian bots posting Brexit supporting messages on social media
attributes.background:
Hold a second referendum to stop Brexit, which will severely weaken the British economy, cause harm to our alliance with eu and eu support. 
After Brexit we’ll have less money to spend on our NHS and schools
